articles.author: Niha Masih, Gerrit De Vynck
articles.title: Google Maps says U.S. users will see Trump’s new name for Gulf of Mexico - The Washington Post
articles.description: Google said it would rename the body of water to “Gulf of America” after it is updated in the U.S. government system in response to Trump’s executive order.
articles.content:
Google will rename the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America on its maps for users in the United States after the change formally goes into effect, the company said Monday.
People in Mexico will see the… [+2666 chars]
